entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:07 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
